EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Silicon Valley State of Mind Roundtable_Q415.1 Week Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday at the Exclusive Luncheon with Bill Cook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are sending you a friendly reminder that you are registered for The Silicon Valley State of Mind Luncheon with Bill Cook. The luncheon will take place Thursday, November 26, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, November 26, 2015 Time: 12:00 - 14:00 Location: Rockpool Bar & Grill, 66 Hunter Street, Sydney
We look forward to you joining us next Thursday! The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/event/silicon-valley-state-of-mind/sydney?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=silicon-valley-state-of-mind-invite>.
